product_description: Spring colors will pop against these gleaming white jeans in a classic skinny cut with five-pocket styling.
product_details_and_care:
Spring colors will pop against these gleaming white jeans in a classic skinny cut with five-pocket styling.
30" inseam; 10" leg opening; 9 1/2" front rise; 15 1/2" back rise (size 29).
Zip fly with button closure.
Faux front pockets; coin pocket; back patch pockets.
99% cotton, 1% spandex.
Machine wash warm, tumble dry low.
By Two by Vince Camuto; imported.
Point of View.
Item #1021703
product_size_info:
Mid rise.
Runs large; order one size down.
